name: CRC8 Control
info:
Checks the message payload on the Cyclic redundancy check

If the payload fails the check the "CheckSuccesfull" bool is changed to false
If the payload succeeds the check the "CheckSuccesfull" bool is changed to true

name: CRC8 Succes
info:
Checks if the "CheckSuccesfull" bool is true/false

if its false a message is sent to the debug console and the flow is ended
if its true the payload continues on to the next logic in the flow

name: Split playload
Create value debug message
Translate payload parts
Prepare payload for sending
Calculate time
